definitions.definition: ( Australia , New Zealand , slang , derogatory ) A worthless person; a hooligan or lout . [From 1930s.]
( Australia , New Zealand , slang ) A person who drives excessively quickly, loudly or irresponsibly; a street drag racer often driving heavily customized cars. [From 1980s.]
( Australia , New Zealand , slang ) An attempt or go at something. [From 1980s.]

main_definition: ( Australia , New Zealand , slang , derogatory ) A worthless person; a hooligan or lout . [From 1930s.]
secondary_definitions: ( Australia , New Zealand , slang ) A person who drives excessively quickly, loudly or irresponsibly; a street drag racer often driving heavily customized cars. [From 1980s.]
( Australia , New Zealand , slang ) An attempt or go at something. [From 1980s.]

definitions.definition: ( historical ) A unit of weight (about 0.378125 of a gram , or 0.0133 of an ounce ) used to measure opium in British-controlled parts of Asia ; a candareen .

main_definition: ( historical ) A unit of weight (about 0.378125 of a gram , or 0.0133 of an ounce ) used to measure opium in British-controlled parts of Asia ; a candareen .

definitions.definition: A pagoda , a type of gold coin .

main_definition: ( India , historical ) A pagoda , a type of gold coin .
